name: @easy6502/app-gnome
description: A one-stop accessible tutorial on 6502 assembly language programming for GNOME

scripts.build:blueprints: blueprint-compiler compile src/widgets/application-window.blp --output src/widgets/application-window.ui && blueprint-compiler compile src/widgets/preferences-dialog.blp --output src/widgets/preferences-dialog.ui && blueprint-compiler compile src/widgets/sidebar.blp --output src/widgets/sidebar.ui && blueprint-compiler compile src/widgets/editor.blp --output src/widgets/editor.ui && blueprint-compiler compile src/widgets/game-console.blp --output src/widgets/game-console.ui
scripts.build: yarn build:resources && yarn build:blueprints && yarn build:vite

author: Pascal Garber <pascal@artandcode.studio>
